bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XLVI (Nos 4803-4843) with contributions by A. BENAISSA, L. CAPPONI, N. GONIS, Chr. MÜLKE, D. OBBINK, P.M. PINTO, F. SCHIRONI, G. UCCIARDELLO, G.A. XENIS, J. YUAN, and A.G. BERESFORD, M.P. POBJOY, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXI (Nos 4803-4843).

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXXI, 4803-4843. - I. Theological Texts (4803-4806). - II. New Literary Texts (4807-4812). - III. Homer and Homerica (4813-4821). - IV. Documentary Texts (4822-4837). - V. Drawings (4838-4843). [List of numbers in The Oxyrhynchus Papyri series allocated in advance to 6 drawings. Nos 4838-4842 are edited by: Helen WHITEHOUSE, Drawing a Fine Line in Oxyrhynchus, Oxyrhynchus. A City and Its Texts = Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 93 (London, 2007) pp. 296-306, 2 figg. et pll. XXVI-XXX coul.]
bibl.seg: HATZILAMBROU R., P.J. PARSONS, and J. CHAPA, with contributions by A. BENAISSA, L. CAPPONI, N. GONIS, Chr. MÜLKE, D. OBBINK, P.M. PINTO, F. SCHIRONI, G. UCCIARDELLO, G.A. XENIS, J. YUAN, and A.G. BERESFORD, M.P. POBJOY, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXI (Nos 4803-4843). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 91.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2007, 8°, xii-164 pp. et XII pll. coul. ISBN 978-0-85698-174-6. £65.

P. Oxy. LXXI, 4803-4843. - I. Theological Texts (4803-4806). - II. New Literary Texts (4807-4812). - III. Homer and Homerica (4813-4821). - IV. Documentary Texts (4822-4837). - V. Drawings (4838-4843). [List of numbers in The Oxyrhynchus Papyri series allocated in advance to 6 drawings. Nos 4838-4842 are edited by: Helen WHITEHOUSE, Drawing a Fine Line in Oxyrhynchus, Oxyrhynchus. A City and Its Texts = Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 93 (London, 2007) pp. 296-306, 2 figg. et pll. XXVI-XXX coul.]

C.R. par Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 84 (2009) Nos 167-168, pp. 357-360. - Wolfgang Luppe, Gnomon 80 (2008) pp. 580-584. - G.M. Parássoglou, Hellenika 58 (2008) pp. 139-140 [concerne aussi: N. GONIS, J.D. THOMAS, R. HATZILAMBROU, with contributions by several authors, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXX (Nos 4759-4802) (London, 2006)]. - Elena Esposito, CR N.S., 60 (2010) pp. 285-288.
